titles.title: SCRUB Act of 2025
SCRUB Act of 2025
Searching for and Cutting Regulations that are Unnecessarily Burdensome Act of 2025
A bill to provide for the establishment of a process for the review of rules and sets of rules, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
